placeholders.specialInstructions: e.g., No onions, extra spicy, extra sauce on the side...

login.title: TacoCrew
login.subtitle: Create your account to join group orders or create your own.

signUp.title: Sign Up
signUp.subtitle: Create your account to get started

passkeys.title: Passkeys

emptyState.title: No passkeys registered
emptyState.description: Add a passkey to enable passwordless sign-in using your device's biometrics or security key. You can register multiple passkeys for different devices.

about.title: About Passkeys
about.description: Passkeys allow you to sign in securely using your device's biometrics (fingerprint, face recognition) or a security key. They're more secure than passwords and can't be phished. You can register multiple passkeys for different devices.

passkeys.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?

hero.title: Welcome back! Ready for <StyledDay>{{day}}</StyledDay> tacos?
hero.subtitle: See your active group orders, check who's joining, and track upcoming deadlines. Everything you need for organizing team orders.

recentGroupOrders.title: Recent group orders
recentGroupOrders.description: Your current and upcoming group orders. Share with your team to get everyone ordering.
recentGroupOrders.emptyState: No group orders yet. Create your first Friday order and invite your team!

latestSubmissions.title: Latest submissions
latestSubmissions.description: Orders you've successfully placed with your team.

root.appSubtitle: Order French tacos together with your team. Create group orders, invite colleagues, and place one big order.

csrf.invalid: CSRF token is invalid or expired. Please refresh the page.

rateLimit.exceeded: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.

submit.noUserOrders: Cannot submit group order with no user orders. Please add at least one order before submitting.
submit.invalidStatus: Cannot submit group order. The order status is {{status}}.
submit.expired: Cannot submit group order. The order period has expired.
submit.emptyUserOrder: Cannot submit group order. One or more user orders are empty.

modify.invalidStatus: Cannot modify user order. The group order status does not allow modifications.

validation.failed: Validation failed. Please check your input and try again.

stock.outOfStock: One or more items are out of stock. Please update your order.

notFound.generic_shareCode: {{resource}} with share code {{identifier}} was not found.

network.failed: Network request failed. Please check your connection and try again.

session.notFound: Session not found. Please sign in again.
session.expired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

unknown.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

forbidden.generic: You don't have permission to perform this action.

unauthorized.generic: You must be signed in to perform this action.

passkey.notFound: Passkey not found. Please try again or use a different authentication method.
passkey.challengeNotFound: Authentication challenge not found. Please refresh and try again.
passkey.registrationNotAllowed: You are not allowed to register this passkey.
passkey.verificationFailed: Failed to verify passkey registration. Please try again.

auth.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
auth.userNotFound: User not found. Please check your email or sign up for a new account.
auth.emailInUse: This email is already in use. Please sign in or use a different email.
auth.invalidToken: Invalid or expired token. Please try again.

cookies.title: Session Cookies
cookies.description: Session cookies and details for order verification
cookies.error: Failed to fetch cookies. Make sure the order has been submitted.

hero.title: Organize group orders for your team
hero.subtitle: Create a group order, share it with your colleagues, and everyone can add their tacos. When ready, place one big order for the whole team.

queue.title: Your group orders
queue.subtitle: All the group orders you've created or joined.
queue.empty: No group orders yet. Create your first one and invite your team!

form.title: Create a new group order
form.subtitle: Set a name, choose when orders close, and share with your team. Everyone can add their tacos!

labels.deadlineHint: Orders must be submitted before this time

errors.datesRequired: Start and end date are required.
errors.endBeforeStart: End date must be after start date.

hero.title: Build your perfect taco
hero.subtitle: Choose your size, meats, sauces, and add extras. Make it exactly how you like it!

sizeSection.title: Choose your size
sizeSection.description: Select the perfect size for your taco

customizeSection.title: Customize your taco
customizeSection.subtitle: Select your meats, sauces, and garnishes

extrasSection.title: Add extras
extrasSection.subtitle: Complete your meal with sides and drinks

summary.title: Order summary
summary.subtitle: Review your selections
summary.emptyState: Select a taco size to see your order summary

validation.missingSelection: Select at least a taco or some extras/drinks/desserts.

previousTacos.title: Reuse a taco
previousTacos.description: Add from your favorites or search by tacoID

hashSearch.title: Find taco by tacoID
hashSearch.description: Enter a tacoID to reuse someone else's recipe

errors.notFound: Taco not found. Please check the tacoID and try again.

errors.missingSelection: Please select at least a taco or some extras/drinks/desserts.
errors.missingFillings: If selecting a taco, please select at least one meat and sauce.
errors.garnishNotAvailable: Garnishes are not available for this taco size.

actions.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{orderName}}"? This will permanently delete the group order and all associated user orders. This action cannot be undone.
actions.deleteError: Failed to delete the group order. Please try again.

share.title: Share this order
share.description: Invite your team to join this group order
share.inviteInstructions: Share this link or code with your team to join this order.

list.title: All orders
list.description: View all orders in this group order

description.default: Create your perfect taco to join this group order.
description.notStarted: The order period has not started yet.

errors.missingSelection: Please select at least one meat, sauce, and garnish.
errors.missingCustomerDetails: All customer, delivery type, address, and requested time fields are required.

hero.title: Place the order
hero.description: Ready to order? Review the details below and submit. This will finalize the order and send it to the restaurant.

form.title: Delivery information
form.description: Where should we deliver this order? Fill in the details below.

fields.noTimeSlotsAvailable: No time slots available for today

address.title: Delivery details
address.description: Customer contact, delivery mode, and address.

preferences.title: Timing & payment
preferences.description: Pick the requested slot and how you'll pay.

saved.title: Saved delivery info
saved.description: Select a saved address or store these details for next time.

form.addDescription: Save a delivery address so you can reuse it next time.

messages.saved: Delivery info saved to your profile.
messages.missingFields: Fill in name, phone, street, postcode, and city before saving.
messages.missingLabel: Add a label to identify this delivery info.
messages.selectProfile: Select a saved delivery info first.
messages.genericError: Unable to save delivery info. Please try again.

reminder.title: Final step
reminder.body: Once you submit, the order will be finalized and sent. Participants won't be able to modify their orders anymore. Make sure everyone has added their tacos!

confirmation.title: Order Confirmed!
confirmation.successMessage: Your order has been confirmed and sent to the restaurant. You will be redirected to the order details page.

errors.missingFields: All customer, delivery type, address, and requested time fields are required.

profile.subtitle: Your account information and order history.

delivery.title: Saved delivery details
delivery.subtitle: Store office addresses or frequent drop-off points you can reuse during submission.
delivery.helper: Create as many profiles as you need, then pick the right one when you finalize a group order.

stats.label: Saved profiles
stats.empty: No saved profiles yet — add one to speed up checkout.

formCard.title: Manage delivery profiles
formCard.description: Add, edit, or remove saved delivery info for quick submissions.

previousOrders.title: My Tacos
previousOrders.description: All your tacos grouped by recipe. See which ones you order most often.

stock.title: What's available
stock.subtitle: Browse available ingredients and items for your orders.

overview.title: Live stock overview
overview.description: Switch categories to see what's available for your orders.

sauces.blurb: Heat, sweetness, and everything in between.

extras.blurb: Add-ons that boost flavour and crunch.
